mapper.select: SELECT article.*, category.id AS categoryId,content.content FROM t_article article LEFT JOIN t_article_category_rel ac ON article.id = ac.article_id LEFT JOIN t_category category ON ac.category_id = category.id LEFT JOIN t_article_content content ON article.id = content.article_id WHERE article.is_deleted = 0 AND category.is_deleted = 0 AND article.id = #{articleId}
